item.description:
We'll celebrate the birthday of 3 members born in March. I hope those 3 can make it for dinner! Your entree is free!

If your birthday is in March, please email me to let me know if you are going. If we don't get 10 people to RSVP yes, I might rescind this offer!

Texas Roadhouse is on the road to the Buckland Hills Showcase Cinemas.

I hope this new location is better for everyone.

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: March Birthday Celebration Dinner
